subject: Skateboards
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: The two-time halfpipe gold medalist Shaun White will compete at the U.S. Open Snowboarding Championships, but he has already begun skateboarding, his summertime diversion.
snippet: The two-time halfpipe gold medalist Shaun White will compete at the U.S. Open Snowboarding Championships, but he has already begun skateboarding, his summertime diversion.
